DOC.brief_summary: This is a single dose inpatient and outpatient study to test whether an effect on the ability of platelets to stick to white blood cells in subjects who smoke.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating the Effects of PSI-697 on Platelets in Subjects Who Smoke
DOC.criteria: Healthy as determined by the investigator on the basis of medical history, physical examination, clinical laboratory test results, vital signs, and 12â€‘lead electrocardiogram (ECG). Smoker of at least 1 pack or more of cigarettes per day (20 plus or minus 3 cigarettes) for more than 1 year as determined by history. Any diagnosed bleeding disorder. Any major surgical procedure within 6 months before study day 1. Any history of major bleeding (eg, bleeding peptic ulcer) within 1 year before study day 1.
